characterList: 飄闆闊閉潤閣擱闡閱悶閃閥閘闢蒼搶菲輩悲徘殲籤纖喉猴韓違

characters.story: "PYAO!" the food sings cheerfully - to flutter, float and drift!
See how the gate forms boss? It whispers "Bǎn!" softly - a vivid image to remember!
"KWOH!" the gate and lively command sharply - broad, wide and spacious!
The gate stands for close, shouting "BEE!" sharply - a vivid image to remember!
"RWUN!" the water commands sharply - to moisten, wet and lubricate!
"Guh?" the gate questions curiously - is this a cabinet, a pavilion in the loft?
"GUH!" the fingers and cabinet sing cheerfully - to put aside, but don't waste time!
The gate and list bend down drooping - to explicate, clarify and expound!
"YWEH!" the gate commands sharply - to peruse, read and inspect!
"MUN!" the heart and gate command sharply - stuffy, silent and stifling!
See how the gate forms flash? It whispers "Shǎn!" softly - a vivid image to remember!
"Fah?" the gate questions curiously - is it a valve for the honorable family to control?
"JAH?" the gate and radish question curiously - the floodgate, sluice and dam?
"PEE!" the gate and hot sauce command sharply - to repudiate, refute and open!
"TSAHNG!" the flowers sing cheerfully - ash-colored, pale blue in the district!
The fingers bend down drooping - to rob, seize and snatch by stealing!
The flowers and jail cell bend down drooping - humble, modest and meager!
"BAY!" the car commands sharply - a lifetime, generation of peers!
"BAY!" the heart sings cheerfully despite being sad - sorrow and grief!
"Pai?" the queue and jail cell question curiously - irresolute, hesitant and pacing!
"JYEN!" the bones and jailbreak sing cheerfully - to annihilate, destroy and wipe out!
"CHYEN!" the bamboo and jailbreak sing cheerfully - a bamboo slip, a divination stick!
"SHYEN!" the thread and jailbreak sing cheerfully - fiber, delicate and tiny for the body!
"HOH?" the mouth questions curiously - the gullet, throat and larynx?
"HOH?" the pack and marquis question curiously - a monkey? To kill a chicken as an example?
Picture korea taking form - it asks "HAN?" with vivid energy!
"WAY?" the road questions curiously - will you disobey, violate and oppose?
